articles.title: Trump announces travel ban affecting a dozen countries set to go into effect Monday
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump is resurrecting the travel ban policy from his first term, signing a proclamation Wednesday night preventing people from a dozen countries from entering the United States.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump is resurrecting the travel ban policy from his first term, signing a proclamation Wednesday night preventing people from a dozen countries from entering the United States.

articles.title: Guatemalan man deported to Mexico returns to US after court orders Trump administration to do so
articles.description: A Guatemalan man deported to Mexico, whom President Donald Trump's administration was working to bring back after a court order, landed in the United States on Wednesday, his attorneys confirmed.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Elon Musk's online war with Republicans leaves Donald Trump to wonder if he's created a monster
articles.description: The anger with Donald Trump's "big, beautiful bill" is taking many creative forms of Elon Musk's X account. It's a different story on Trump's Truth Social.
articles.content:
The anger is taking many forms on Elon Musk's X account.
Multiple graphs illustrating the growing national debt.
A meme showing a microscopic pair of scissors with the words: "Republicans getting ready to reduce the size of government."
Even a sword-... [5355 chars]
